prerequisites: THREE OF: Archaeology 40, Science (Biology) 40, Science (Bontany) 40, Science (Geology) 40, Science (Zoology) 40
system.description: You can access to the [Fossil] Tutor List, and may tutor Attacks from the from that Tutor List as if you knew them already yourself, up to your Grade. You receive +20 on Teaching Checks to Tutor [Fossil] creatures.

actions.name: Yesterday and Today
actions.description: You can access to the [Fossil] Tutor List, and may tutor Attacks from the from that Tutor List as if you knew them already yourself, up to your Grade. You receive +20 on Teaching Checks to Tutor [Fossil] creatures.
